scripts.build:bundler: PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" rustup run stable wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir dist-bundler --release
scripts.build:web: PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" rustup run stable wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist-web --release
scripts.build:node: PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" rustup run stable wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir dist-node --release
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:bundler && pnpm run build:node
scripts.test: PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" rustup run stable wasm-pack test --node
